hero.title: Discover Vietnam
hero.subtitle: Explore the beauty of Southeast Asia's hidden gem
hero.description: From bustling cities to pristine beaches, ancient temples to modern marvels - Vietnam offers an unforgettable journey through culture, cuisine, and natural wonders.

map.title: Explore Vietnam
map.subtitle: Click on any city to discover more

hanoi.name: Hanoi
hanoi.description: Vietnam's charming capital blends ancient traditions with modern energy.
hanoi.details: The political and cultural heart of Vietnam, Hanoi captivates visitors with its tree-lined boulevards, French colonial architecture, and vibrant street food scene.

hochiminh.name: Ho Chi Minh City
hochiminh.description: The bustling economic hub of southern Vietnam.
hochiminh.details: Formerly Saigon, this dynamic metropolis pulses with energy, offering everything from historic landmarks to cutting-edge cuisine and nightlife.

danang.name: Da Nang
danang.description: Coastal city known for beautiful beaches and modern bridges.
danang.details: A perfect blend of urban sophistication and natural beauty, Da Nang serves as the gateway to central Vietnam's UNESCO World Heritage sites.

hue.name: Hue
hue.description: Ancient imperial capital with rich cultural heritage.
hue.details: Once the seat of the Nguyen Dynasty, Hue enchants visitors with its imperial citadel, royal tombs, and traditional cuisine.

hoian.name: Hoi An
hoian.description: UNESCO World Heritage ancient trading port.
hoian.details: This perfectly preserved ancient town glows with lanterns at night and offers a magical journey through Vietnam's trading history.

nhatrang.name: Nha Trang
nhatrang.description: Premier beach destination with crystal clear waters.
nhatrang.details: Vietnam's premier beach resort destination, famous for its pristine beaches, vibrant nightlife, and excellent seafood.

phuquoc.name: Phu Quoc
phuquoc.description: Tropical island paradise with pristine beaches.
phuquoc.details: Vietnam's largest island offers white sand beaches, pepper plantations, and some of the world's most beautiful sunsets.
